thread.title: Viewsroom: The Fed's belated Wells Fargo beating

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Viewsroom: The Fed's belated Wells Fargo beating
text:
NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Chair Janet Yellen forbids the $2 trln lender from growing bigger - on her last day in the job, and 17 months after Wellsâ€™ fake-accounts scandal hit. Meanwhile, fellow financial watchdog CFPB seems to be giving hacked Equifax a free pass. Plus: how Nintendo made a comeback.
Breakingviews Reuters Breakingviews is the world's leading source of agenda-setting financial insight. As the Reuters brand for financial commentary, we dissect the big business and economic stories as they break around the world every day. A global team of about 30 correspondents in New York, London, Hong Kong and other major cities provides expert analysis in real time.
